target.rawSql:
WITH target_instrument AS (
  SELECT id, name
  FROM instruments
  WHERE id IN ($instrument)
)

SELECT
  o.start_time AS time,
  o.end_time AS timeEnd,
  t.name || ' OFF' AS title,
  'TEM server offline' AS text
FROM tem_off o
JOIN target_instrument t
  ON o.instrument_id = t.id

targets.rawSql:
WITH family_param AS (
    SELECT param_id, enum_id
    FROM parameters
    WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
      AND param_name = 'ProductFamily'
),

latest_product_family AS (
    SELECT e.member_name AS product_family
    FROM family_param p
    JOIN data d
      ON d.param_id = p.param_id
     AND d.instrument_id = $instrument
     AND d.value_num > 0
     AND d.time > now() - interval '10 days'
    JOIN enum_values e
      ON e.enum_id = p.enum_id
     AND e.value = d.value_num
    ORDER BY d.time DESC
    LIMIT 1
),

instrument_times AS (
    SELECT
        (SELECT time FROM data d WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 1) AS oldest_data,
        (SELECT time FROM data d WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) AS latest_data
)

SELECT 
    i.name AS "Name",
    i.serial AS "Serial",
    i.model AS "Model",
    lpf.product_family AS "Product family",
    i.server AS "Server IP",
    i.ds_version AS "Data services",
    it.oldest_data AS "Oldest data",
    it.latest_data AS "Latest data"
FROM instruments i
CROSS JOIN latest_product_family lpf
CROSS JOIN instrument_times it
WHERE i.id = $instrument;

WITH param_map AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM (VALUES
    ($param_id_server, 'TEM server'),
    ($param_id_feg, 'FEG'),
    ($param_id_ht, 'High Tension'),
    ($param_id_autoloader, 'Autoloader'),
    ($param_id_tempctrl, 'Temperature'),
    ($param_id_stage, 'Stage'),
    ($param_id_optics, 'Optics'),
    ($param_id_filter, 'Energy filter'),
    ($param_id_detectors, 'Detectors')

  ) AS t(param_id, custom_name)
),
ranked AS (
  SELECT
    pm.custom_name,
    d.value_num,
    d.time,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
      PARTITION BY d.param_id
      ORDER BY d.time DESC
    ) AS rn_last,
    MAX(d.time) FILTER (WHERE d.value_num = 0)
      OVER (PARTITION BY d.param_id) AS last_zero_time
  FROM data d
  JOIN param_map pm
    ON pm.param_id = d.param_id
  WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument
)
SELECT
  custom_name,
  value_num AS last_value,
  last_zero_time
FROM ranked
WHERE rn_last = 1
ORDER BY custom_name;

list.definition:
SELECT
  id AS __value,
  name || ' [' || model || '] (' || serial || ')' AS __text
FROM instruments
ORDER BY name;
list.name: instrument
list.query:
SELECT
  id AS __value,
  name || ' [' || model || '] (' || serial || ')' AS __text
FROM instruments
ORDER BY name;

list.definition:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'Value'
    AND component = 'Server'
    AND subsystem = 'Software'
list.name: param_id_server
list.query:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'Value'
    AND component = 'Server'
    AND subsystem = 'Software'

list.definition:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'FegState'
    AND display_name = 'Feg State'
    AND subsystem IN ('MdlGunBrick', 'MdlTemFegBrick')
list.name: param_id_feg
list.query:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'FegState'
    AND display_name = 'Feg State'
    AND subsystem IN ('MdlGunBrick', 'MdlTemFegBrick')

list.definition:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'HTTankState'
    AND component = 'HTTank'
    AND subsystem IN ('MdlGunBrick', 'MdlHighTensionBrick')

    AND subsystem IN ('MdlGunBrick', 'MdlHighTensionBrick')

list.definition:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name IN ('Status', 'CompuStageStatus')
    AND subsystem IN ('Compustage', 'MdlSmc')
list.name: param_id_stage
list.query:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name IN ('Status', 'CompuStageStatus')
    AND subsystem IN ('Compustage', 'MdlSmc')

list.definition:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name in ('OpticsOperationalState', 'Optics_OperationalState')
list.name: param_id_optics
list.query:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name in ('OpticsOperationalState', 'Optics_OperationalState')

list.definition:
SELECT COALESCE((
  SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND subsystem = 'EnergyFilterBrick'
    AND param_name = 'EnergyFilterIsAvailable'
  LIMIT 1
), -1)
list.name: param_id_filter
list.query:
SELECT COALESCE((
  SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND subsystem = 'EnergyFilterBrick'
    AND param_name = 'EnergyFilterIsAvailable'
  LIMIT 1
), -1)

list.definition:

list.definition:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'Availability'
    AND display_name IN ('Camera availability', 'Availability')
list.name: param_id_detectors
list.query:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'Availability'
    AND display_name IN ('Camera availability', 'Availability')
